headline: Assessing Deckers Outdoor (DECK) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum And Mixed Fair Value Signals
summary: Why Deckers Outdoor Is On Investors’ Radar Deckers Outdoor (DECK) has drawn attention after recent share price moves, with the stock up over the past week, month and past 3 months, prompting investors to reassess how its fundamentals align with that performance. See our latest analysis for Deckers Outdoor. The recent 30 day share price return of 18.08% and 90 day share price return of 45.91% at a latest share price of $118.89 sit against a 1 year total shareholder return of a 22.06% decline,...
